text: 28 Soon after this , the General found himself obliged to go to London for a week ; and he left Northanger earnestly regretting that any necessity should rob him even for an hour of Miss Morland ’s company , and anxiously recommending the study of her comfort and amusement to his children as their chief object in his absence .

text: His departure gave Catherine the first experimental conviction that a loss may be sometimes a gain .

text: The happiness with which their time now passed , every employment voluntary , every laugh indulged , every meal a scene of ease and good humour , walking where they liked and when they liked , their hours , pleasures , and fatigues at their own command , made her thoroughly sensible of the restraint which the General ’s presence had imposed , and most thankfully feel their present release from it .

text_tokenized: And she only wanted to know how far , after what had passed , an apology might properly be received by her .

text: But the knowledge would have been useless here ; it was not called for ; neither clemency nor dignity was put to the trial — Eleanor brought no message .
text_tokenized: But the knowledge would have been useless here ; it was not called for ; neither clemency nor dignity was put to the trial — Eleanor brought no message .

text: Very little passed between them on meeting ; each found her greatest safety in silence , and few and trivial were the sentences exchanged while they remained upstairs , Catherine in busy agitation completing her dress , and Eleanor with more goodwill than experience intent upon filling the trunk .
text_tokenized: Very little passed between them on meeting ; each found her greatest safety in silence , and few and trivial were the sentences exchanged while they remained upstairs , Catherine in busy agitation completing her dress , and Eleanor with more goodwill than experience intent upon filling the trunk .

text: When everything was done they left the room , Catherine lingering only half a minute behind her friend to throw a parting glance on every well - known , cherished object , and went down to the breakfast - parlour , where breakfast was prepared .
text_tokenized: When everything was done they left the room , Catherine lingering only half a minute behind her friend to throw a parting glance on every well - known , cherished object , and went down to the breakfast - parlour , where breakfast was prepared .

text: She tried to eat , as well to save herself from the pain of being urged as to make her friend comfortable ; but she had no appetite , and could not swallow many mouthfuls .
text_tokenized: She tried to eat , as well to save herself from the pain of being urged as to make her friend comfortable ; but she had no appetite , and could not swallow many mouthfuls .

text: The contrast between this and her last breakfast in that room gave her fresh misery , and strengthened her distaste for everything before her .
text_tokenized: The contrast between this and her last breakfast in that room gave her fresh misery , and strengthened her distaste for everything before her .

text: It was not four and twenty hours ago since they had met there to the same repast , but in circumstances how different !
text_tokenized: It was not four and twenty hours ago since they had met there to the same repast , but in circumstances how different !

text: with what cheerful ease , what happy , though false , security , had she then looked around her , enjoying everything present , and fearing little in future , beyond Henry ’s going to Woodston for a day !
text_tokenized: with what cheerful ease , what happy , though false , security , had she then looked around her , enjoying everything present , and fearing little in future , beyond Henry ’s going to Woodston for a day !

text: happy , happy breakfast !
text_tokenized: happy , happy breakfast !

text: for Henry had been there ; Henry had sat by her and helped her .
text_tokenized: for Henry had been there ; Henry had sat by her and helped her .

text: These reflections were long indulged undisturbed by any address from her companion , who sat as deep in thought as herself ; and the appearance of the carriage was the first thing to startle and recall them to the present moment .
text_tokenized: These reflections were long indulged undisturbed by any address from her companion , who sat as deep in thought as herself ; and the appearance of the carriage was the first thing to startle and recall them to the present moment .

text: Catherine ’s colour rose at the sight of it ; and the indignity with which she was treated , striking at that instant on her mind with peculiar force , made her for a short time sensible only of resentment .
text_tokenized: Catherine ’s colour rose at the sight of it ; and the indignity with which she was treated , striking at that instant on her mind with peculiar force , made her for a short time sensible only of resentment .

text: Eleanor seemed now impelled into resolution and speech .
text_tokenized: Eleanor seemed now impelled into resolution and speech .

text: “ You _ must _ write to me , Catherine , ” she cried ; “ you _ must _ let me hear from you as soon as possible .
text_tokenized: “ You _ must _ write to me , Catherine , ” she cried ; “ you _ must _ let me hear from you as soon as possible .

text: Till I know you to be safe at home , I shall not have an hour ’s comfort .
text_tokenized: Till I know you to be safe at home , I shall not have an hour ’s comfort .

text: For _ one _ letter , at all risks , all hazards , I must entreat .
text_tokenized: For _ one _ letter , at all risks , all hazards , I must entreat .

text: Let me have the satisfaction of knowing that you are safe at Fullerton , and have found your family well , and then , till I can ask for your correspondence as I ought to do , I will not expect more .
text_tokenized: Let me have the satisfaction of knowing that you are safe at Fullerton , and have found your family well , and then , till I can ask for your correspondence as I ought to do , I will not expect more .

text: Direct to me at Lord Longtown ’s , and , I must ask it , under
text_tokenized: Direct to me at Lord Longtown ’s , and , I must ask it , under

text: cover to Alice . ”
text_tokenized: cover to Alice . ”

text: “ No , Eleanor , if you are not allowed to receive a letter from me , I am sure I had better not write .
text_tokenized: “ No , Eleanor , if you are not allowed to receive a letter from me , I am sure I had better not write .

text: There can be no doubt of my getting home safe . ”
text_tokenized: There can be no doubt of my getting home safe . ”

text: Eleanor only replied , “ I can not wonder at your feelings .
text_tokenized: Eleanor only replied , “ I can not wonder at your feelings .

text: I will not importune you .
text_tokenized: I will not importune you .

text: I will trust to your own kindness of heart when I am at a distance from you . ”
text_tokenized: I will trust to your own kindness of heart when I am at a distance from you . ”

text: But this , with the look of sorrow accompanying it , was enough to melt Catherine ’s pride in a moment , and she instantly said , “ Oh , Eleanor , I _ will _ write to you indeed .
text_tokenized: But this , with the look of sorrow accompanying it , was enough to melt Catherine ’s pride in a moment , and she instantly said , “ Oh , Eleanor , I _ will _ write to you indeed .

text: There was yet another point which Miss Tilney was anxious to settle , though somewhat embarrassed in speaking of .
text_tokenized: There was yet another point which Miss Tilney was anxious to settle , though somewhat embarrassed in speaking of .

text: It had occurred to her that after so long an absence from home , Catherine might not be provided with money enough for the expenses of her journey , and , upon suggesting it to her with most affectionate offers of accommodation , it proved to be exactly the case .
text_tokenized: It had occurred to her that after so long an absence from home , Catherine might not be provided with money enough for the expenses of her journey , and , upon suggesting it to her with most affectionate offers of accommodation , it proved to be exactly the case .

text: Catherine had never thought on the subject till that moment , but , upon examining her purse , was convinced that but for this kindness of her friend , she might have been turned from the house without even the means of getting home ; and the distress in which she must have been thereby involved filling the minds of both , scarcely another word was said by either during the time of their remaining together .
text_tokenized: Catherine had never thought on the subject till that moment , but , upon examining her purse , was convinced that but for this kindness of her friend , she might have been turned from the house without even the means of getting home ; and the distress in which she must have been thereby involved filling the minds of both , scarcely another word was said by either during the time of their remaining together .

text: Short , however , was that time .
text_tokenized: Short , however , was that time .

text: The carriage was soon announced to be ready ; and Catherine , instantly rising , a long and affectionate embrace supplied the place of language in bidding each other adieu ; and , as they entered the hall , unable to leave the house without some mention of one whose name had not yet been spoken by either

text: , she paused a moment , and with quivering lips just made it intelligible that she left “ her kind remembrance for her absent friend . ”
text_tokenized: , she paused a moment , and with quivering lips just made it intelligible that she left “ her kind remembrance for her absent friend . ”

text: But with this approach to his name ended all possibility of restraining her feelings ; and , hiding her face as well as she could with her handkerchief , she darted across the hall , jumped into the chaise , and in a moment was driven from the door .
